resources.string: Something went wrong authenticating the client. Try again.
Password must be at least 65 bits of entropy (at least 12 characters, mixed case, mixed alphanumeric and non-alphanumeric).
Must be at least 6 characters. Make it longer.
Not available. Must be at least 3 characters different than an existing network. Make it unique or longer.
Account might already exist. Please start over.
We sent a code to %s. Please enter it below.
You may need to check your spam folder or unblock no-reply@bringyour.com
